languages.text: "Ваша правда, делать выводы и выносить приговоры — мой прямой долг".
"Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."
languages.original_text: "Ваша правда, делать выводы и выносить приговоры — мой прямой долг".

traits.locale_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."
"Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."
"Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."
"Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."
"Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."
"Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

languages.text: "Also gut. Es ist meine Pflicht, Schlussfolgerungen zu ziehen und Urteile zu fällen."
languages.original_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

traits.locale_text: "Also gut. Es ist meine Pflicht, Schlussfolgerungen zu ziehen und Urteile zu fällen."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. Il est de mon devoir de tirer des conclusions et de prononcer des verdicts. »
languages.original_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. Il est de mon devoir de tirer des conclusions et de prononcer des verdicts. »

languages.text: 「いいでしょう。結論を下し、判決を言い渡すのは私の本来の任務ですから」
languages.original_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

traits.locale_text: 「いいでしょう。結論を下し、判決を言い渡すのは私の本来の任務ですから」

languages.text: «De acuerdo. Es mi deber sacar conclusiones y dictar sentencia».
languages.original_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo. Es mi deber sacar conclusiones y dictar sentencia».

languages.text: “好吧，毕竟得出结论、下达判决是我的直接职责。”
languages.original_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

traits.locale_text: “好吧，毕竟得出结论、下达判决是我的直接职责。”

languages.text: "Makul. Bir sonuca varıp son kararı vermek, benim asıl görevim."
languages.original_text: "Fair enough. It is my direct duty to draw conclusions and pass verdicts."

traits.locale_text: "Makul. Bir sonuca varıp son kararı vermek, benim asıl görevim."
